document_data.name: Manganese
document_data.mainbody: '''Manganese''' was an elemental material found in the [[Realms]].
document_data.Description: Manganese appeared as a metallic black substance, similar to [[hematite]].
document_data.Usages:
* Manganese had some use in producing metal alloys.
* Metal-polishing abrasives used a mixture of substances, including manganese, [[iron]] oxide, and other minerals and [[oil]]s.{{Cite web/Forging the Realms/Thaelon Morgyr's Map}}
